body:
#### PR description:

Add additional setup needed to run the millepede production system inside singularity containers, required for automated alignment. 
Should leave existing alignment workflow fully invariant. 
CC @TomasKello 

#### PR validation:

Small test alignment campaign with the modified code produces output binary identical to reference with the unmodified release. 
All unit tests pass. No new tests added as only existing scripts modified. 
Testing inside singularity within the automated alignment framework to be done after PR is merged.

- not a backport
title: modify MPS scripts to support automated alignment
